Text: Dear Taeguki San, Hontoni Domo Arigato Gozaimasu for all the torrents of Japanese animation. I believe Nippon Animation is one of the best in the world. But it is just a pitty that some of these Japanese anime cannot be downloaded, because of no seeder, and no leecher. So would you please seed these torrents yourself. Dozo Yoroshiku Onegaitashimasu.
Hi! Please seed! I am stuck in 59.6% for days and months!!! PLEASE SEED! Arigato!!!
